text: NGC 441 is a lenticular galaxy of type (R')SB(rs)0/a? located in the constellation Sculptor. It was discovered on September 27, 1834 by John Herschel. It was described by Dreyer as "prety faint, small, round, gradually brighter middle." ==References== ==External links== * 0441 18340927 Category:Sculptor (constellation) Category:Lenticular galaxies
title: NGC 441
